Grenade_Launcher.help: Launches an M30 Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your Assault rifle. This explosion from this grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.
Grenade_Launcher.targetHelp: Launches an M30 Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your Assault rifle. This explosion from this grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

Dragons_Tail.help: This low spinning kick deals the same damage as Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits will trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.shortHelp: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback
